summary: Simple plugin to open and close help without leaving current window
name: extended-help
description:
Plugin to open and close help without leaving current window
It is mostly useful when you want a quick reference

Use:
:Help subject - get help using :help command. It opens help window but cursor stays in the current window
:Help! subject - help with :help! command
:Help or :Help! - close help window

versions.release_notes: Add completion, fix argument handling, do not switch to another window if :Help was used in help window
